item.title: Beginning of the Adventure
item.description: I have been reading content shared by other professionals for years and I have observed the different strategies they use to create their content. I like to take personal notes as it helps me to nourish my knowledge and I simplify most of the parts by removing fancy words. I consider fancy words as those that bring confusion rather than value to the reader. I have been thinking of sharing my point of view with the online community, but I always postponed it.
